content: I’m a postdoc at the Learning and Intelligence Systems Lab working with Marc Toussaint. My research interests include task and motion planning in robotics, and learning and reasoning for intelligent systems. I received my PhD degree from TU Munich, where I focused on HRI in close-proximity scenarios. I studied computer science at UBC and Ko√ß Uni, and started my research journey working on haptic interfaces.
summary: I’m a postdoc at the Learning and Intelligence Systems Lab working with Marc Toussaint. My research interests include task and motion planning in robotics, and learning and reasoning for intelligent systems.
title: Oz S. Oguz
